publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-1633 Mr Stewart Maxwell:A Smoke-Free Parliamentâ€”That the Parliament supports the principle of smoke-free workplaces and applauds the decision of the Scottish Executive to make all Executive-occupied buildings smoke-free from 30 August 2004 and urges members of the Parliament to lobby the Scottish Parliament Corporate Body to make the new Parliament building at Holyrood a completely smoke-free workplace, protecting the health of workers, including cleaning staff who may have to enter these premises although they may be non-smokers, and also setting a healthy example to the rest of the people of Scotland. Supported by: Bristow Muldoon*, Rob Gibson*, Shiona Baird*, Mike Pringle*, Michael Matheson*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Keith Raffan*
S2M-1633 A Smoke-Free Parliament (lodged on 31 August 2004) Stewart Stevenson*
S2M-1633 A Smoke-Free Parliament (lodged on 31 August 2004) Alex Neil*
S2M-1633 A Smoke-Free Parliament (lodged on 31 August 2004) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1633 A Smoke-Free Parliament (lodged on 31 August 2004) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-1633 A Smoke-Free Parliament (lodged on 31 August 2004) Margo MacDonald*
